data.title: Niantic Reviews and Complaints
data.meta_description: Niantic has 382 reviews (average rating 2.0). Consumers say: Pokemon Go Account Hacked, My account was stolen, Can you just fix your game Niantic
data.text:
Niantic Support is hard to reach. I'm not sure if emails are making it to a person, or just going straight to an auto-generated response inbox.

My account was hacked, and I provided proof of the *** to the support team, but received no response. Since my account was hacked, I have also been trying to get a refund for upcoming event tickets that I have bought. Again, no response.

Customer support is very poor, which reflects that the company is only there to make money and does not care about its consumer base. It's a poor model for a company!

My name is Griffin Sky and I am disabled both mentally and physically. I attended the LA Pokemon Shinnoh Event and the following are concerns I have with the event that I have brought to my lawyers attention.

The Venue/Habit Experience

Niantic didn't seem to have a spokesperson that was disabled.

The stadium stairs were exhausting. It was very distressing not being able to bring my own water and food into the stadium. There were so many cracks and trip hazards in the paths that I twisted my leg. There was a woman in a wheelchair that did not have the access she needed.

I myself have blisters from walking the event. The event didn't seem to have any knowledge of LA. This is a traffic city, not a walking city. Why would you not have short route options that you made everywhere with directions?

Getting to specific venues at specific times was nearly impossible!! You should have guided people.

Advertising and the City Experience

Again, LA is not a walking city, it is a traffic city. I was put in danger walking because of it. When customers buy tickets and add ons they need SOLID TRUTHFUL information and detailed time frames posted.

You did not give this in trainer tips or trainers club, Your advertising did not say when the add on's started. It said beginning midnight and then said 9-5pm Gen 4 Pokemon for special raids and eggs. These could not be activated if you were not at the event venue. This was not advertised.

I was planning on activating from Oregon and booked a later flight because of it. This made me miss an entire day of the event!

The Eggs

I hatched over 200 eggs and only three were shiny!! I traveled from out of state for this and it is unacceptable. The odds at Sinnoh should have been better for the price of the event, travel and add on's.

I expected to find more regionals as well. When watching video's of people Niantic sponsors they all the shinys and regionals they had hoped for. I was going full capacity and got ONE Shiny Regional.

If I spent my money on eggs then I would have had better odds.

As a true fan who is also disabled I am very disappointment in Shinnoh Tour. Gen 4 is my favorite and I feel Ishould be compensated.

Niantic has officially ruined Pokémon as a whole and asked me for the last 4 digits of my SSN. I didn't even buy anything!!!

They have made Pokémon Go into an entirely different game than actual Pokémon, sooo many bugs that it forces me to waste my items, and the features they add into the game to supposedly HELP the gameplay never ever work!

Plus, I have a massive suspicion that certain players are being favored, but that might also be one of their many bugs. My goldfish can do better customer service programming and listening to the player base, this is crazy.
